attributes.action: prevent Durham University from turning St Cuthbert's Society into a College
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Durham University is proposing to turn the third oldest student body at Durham (founded in 1888) into a College. This petition is to demonstrate that the current and past members and the friends of St Cuthbert's Socierty are against this move.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
